definition: to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: The hawkish Cho believed the Separatists had attacked Glid Station.
sentences.chinese: 強硬的喬相信格利德站遭到了分裂分子的進攻。

sentences.english: For diagnosing problems, HSSI offe four loopback tests.
sentences.chinese: 診斷問題，HSSI進攻四迴路測試。

sentences.english: But after ru-song li river in hanyang paju there is still no offense.
sentences.chinese: 但是李如松過江後駐守坡州仍然沒有進攻漢陽。

sentences.english: The Governor of Prome did indeed lead a in 1743 raid.
sentences.chinese: 卑廖地方長官在1743年確實發動了一次進攻。

sentences.english: Eastern Front, the opposition attack again Zili Tan 19.
sentences.chinese: 東線戰場上，反對派19日再次進攻茲利坦。

sentences.english: The attack breached their cease-fire agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他們的進攻行動違反了停火協定。
他有沒有“強大的”進攻性網絡武器？

sentences.english: The platoon was sent to reconnoitre the village before the attack.
sentences.chinese: 在發動進攻前，這個排奉命偵察該村。

sentences.english: The enemy attacked in great numbers but our men stood their ground.
sentences.chinese: 敵人大舉進攻，但我方戰士仍堅守陣地。
“進攻，”哈塞爾貝克說“我們一定能更好。”

sentences.english: Larger 10)amphibious assault forces attack beaches head on in massed formations.
sentences.chinese: 大型的兩棲作戰部隊以大規模編隊正面進攻海灘。

sentences.english: The UN force was strung out across northern Korea and not prepared for a Chinese attack.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國部隊在朝鮮擺開陣勢，並未防備中國的進攻。

sentences.english: RETREAT】The enemy retreated before the advance of our soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 敵軍在我們士兵的進攻下退卻了。

sentences.english: We replied to the enemy's attack with a barrage.
sentences.chinese: 我軍以齊射的炮火回擊敵軍的進攻。

sentences.english: I attacked again, this time with all the skill I could muster.
sentences.chinese: 我再次進攻，這一次用上了我所能集中的一切記憶。

sentences.english: He was confident on their own can also win city huoshan, then ordered the attack.
sentences.chinese: 他自信靠自己的力量也能拿下霍山城，於是命令進攻。

definition: to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
